Text:
Hey bobiras22, thanks for the upload, although, for some reason it doesn't want to work on my Acer A200 tablet. The light version which was downloadable through google play does work and that site say's my unit is compatible.

Any idea why this version here won't load up? It starts up for a brief second and then just shuts down. Looks like the screen resolution on this one you have here is set for a small device..  

I really wanted this one...   :)

@termin8r1


Yes this version is for android phones only.Tablet version isnt released yet.But you can try with chainfire 3d with plugins and options for textures.Maybe it will help with the problem

Hey bobiras2009, thanks for the reply. The interesting part is that I can download the lite version through google play and it loads up and plays well.

Thanks for the info on the chainfire 3d. Never heard of this app until today. I did download it and test it out but it doesn't seem to make much difference....

@termin8r1

Yes the latest version is 2.6.The latest cracked is 1.9.1 and is not for tablet.I will upload the latest version when it will be cracked.

Hi Bobiras2009, I just noticed the difference file version as you mentioned it...  

Np, Hopefully somebody will release this at some point.. thanks again for all your great work and efforts..  :)
